description: Defines the 'Story' immutable data class representing a story item in the app feed, including properties such as id, content, anonymity status, author name, creation timestamp, and like/dislike counts.

classes.name: Story
classes.description: An immutable data class representing a story item in the app feed with properties for id, content, author information, timestamp, and engagement metrics.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Story instance with specified fields replaced, allowing easy modifications while maintaining immutability.

methods.name: displayAuthor
methods.description: Returns the display name of the author, showing 'Anonymous' if the story is posted anonymously, otherwise the author's name or a placeholder.
